text: Geoffrey Stephens (1 October 1934 â€“ 24 December 2020) was an English songwriter and record producer. His single "Winchester Cathedral" won him the 1967 Grammy Award for Best Contemporary (R&R;) Recording. He was born in London. Other best known singles were "Sorry Suzanne", "Daughter of Darkness" and "You Won't Find Another Fool Like Me". Stephens died on 24 December 2020 at the age of 86.Geoff Stephens Passed Away ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2020 deaths Category:English songwriters Category:English record producers Category:Writers from London Category:British Grammy Award winners
title: Geoff Stephens
